post:
>buying into a party line as hard as you are

I literally never have and never will vote for either party.  There is no party line to buy into.  Respecting ones right to transition while recognizing that they are still a biological male or female...isn't hateful.  No amount of hormones is going to change chromosomes.  

The problem comes when one side, who champions science, willfully chooses to ignore it when the other side actually has a point.  The problem comes when biological males who have transitioned destroy biological females in sports...and so called 'feminists' are okay with that.  

Biological women are literally losing championships and scholarships because trans-women, with a natural advantage, are blowing them out of the water.  "But they're women too," apparently.  

It's the willful avoidance of basic common sense that makes what was once a centrist look like a nazi to the left.  Sorry, but that's not my problem.      

>(Also, you can swear on reddit, it's okay.)

I've had comments blocked because of that in the past, so I just don't chance it anymore.
